author: Volik
long_description:
Adds usable nodes, such as kill block, or move block. ### Blocks list - Kill block: Kills player - Move block: Moves player to `player.x` + 1, `player.y` + 1, `player.z` + 1 - Heal block: Adds 1 hp to player - Damage block: Removes 1 hp from player - Eatable block: Adds maximum hp - 1 to player - Inedible block: Removes maximum hp - 1 from player - Breath block: Adds 1 breath bubble to player - Suffocation block: Remvoes 1 breath bubble from player - Question block: ???
### How to Dig the block you need to interact!
### Credits Textures drawn in **LibreSprite**.
name: usable_nodes
short_description: Adds usable nodes, such as kill block, or move block.
title: Usable Nodes
